mapper.select: select t1.* from (SELECT t1.`ADMINOBJECT`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`SYSADMINID`, t1.`SYSADMINNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SYSADMIN` t1 ) t1 where sysadminid=#{id}
mapper.sql: SELECT t1.ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.SYSADMINID, t1.SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFSYSADMIN t1

SELECT t1.`ADMINOBJECT`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`SYSADMINID`, t1.`SYSADMINNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SYSADMIN` t1
SELECT t1.ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO, t1.RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4, t1.SYSADMINID, t1.SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN FROM T_SYSADMIN t1

SELECT t1.ADMINOBJECT AS ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.SYSADMINID AS SYSADMINID, t1.SYSADMINNAME AS SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFSYSADMIN t1

SELECT t1.ADMINOBJECT AS ADMINOBJECT, t1.CREATEDATE AS CREATEDATE, t1.CREATEMAN AS CREATEMAN, t1.MEMO AS MEMO, t1.RESERVER AS RESERVER, t1.RESERVER2 AS RESERVER2, t1.RESERVER3 AS RESERVER3, t1.RESERVER4 AS RESERVER4, t1.SYSADMINID AS SYSADMINID, t1.SYSADMINNAME AS SYSADMINNAME, t1.UPDATEDATE AS UPDATEDATE, t1.UPDATEMAN AS UPDATEMAN FROM T_SRFSYSADMIN t1

SELECT t1.[ADMINOBJECT], t1.[CREATEDATE], t1.[CREATEMAN], t1.[MEMO], t1.[RESERVER], t1.[RESERVER2], t1.[RESERVER3], t1.[RESERVER4], t1.[SYSADMINID], t1.[SYSADMINNAME], t1.[UPDATEDATE], t1.[UPDATEMAN] FROM [T_SRFSYSADMIN] t1

SELECT t1.`ADMINOBJECT`, t1.`CREATEDATE`, t1.`CREATEMAN`, t1.`MEMO`, t1.`RESERVER`, t1.`RESERVER2`, t1.`RESERVER3`, t1.`RESERVER4`, t1.`SYSADMINID`, t1.`SYSADMINNAME`, t1.`UPDATEDATE`, t1.`UPDATEMAN` FROM `T_SYSADMIN` t1
